lead_paragraph: EDWARDS--Thomas John, died peacefully on March 19, 2016, at age 67, surrounded by his family. He will be remembered for his sense of humor, love of sailing and biking, and appreciation of the arts. He is survived by his wife of 39 years, Julie, his children, Jenny and T.J., and many loving family members. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  EDWARDS, THOMAS JOHN
